definition: an implement with a flat part of mesh or plastic and a long handle, splash and flutter about in or as if in water
details:
noun
- an implement with a flat part of mesh or plastic and a long handle
= example: an implement with a flat part of mesh or plastic and a long handle
= synonyms: flyswatter, flyswat
verb
- splash and flutter about in or as if in water
= example: splash and flutter about in or as if in water
